mcq.statement: Council of Common Interests (CCI) is a constitutional body of Pakistan. Membership of CCI consists of:

options.a: Prime Minister, all Provincial Chief Ministers and 3 members nominated by the Prime Minister
options.b: President, all Provincial Governors and Chief Ministers, Prime Minister and Minister for Inter-Provincial Coordination
options.c: President, Prime Minister Chairman Senate, Provincial Chief Ministers and Chief of Army Staff
options.d: Prime Minister, Speaker National Assembly, all Chief Ministers and three Ministers nominated by the Prime Minister
